posts.title: It is been my dream to ensure every resident of Bengal leads a secure & fulfilling life.This dream has inspired me to design schemes that give holistic protection to all. Today, these schemes have come together as a testimony of my endeavor my Suraksha Kawach

Through #DidirSurakshaKawach campaign, my delegates will reach out to every household to ensure that every family is covered under the protective shield of 15 GoWB schemes across 6 core sectors.It‚Äôs my resolve to not leave anyone behind in this welfare mission. (2/2)

This day, 25 years ago, TMC came into existence. I recall our struggles through the years & the role we have played in empowering people, fighting injustice and inspiring hope.  I heartily congratulate everyone for believing in the power of MAA, MAATI, MANUSH.

I inaugurated the 28th Kolkata International Film Festival today with luminaries like Hon‚Äôble Governor CV Bose, @SrBachchan, Jaya ji, @iamsrk, @ShatruganSinha, @SGanguly99, Rani Mukherjee, among others

TMC‚Äôs Peace & Goodwill Concert in Shillong was a sight to behold.  Performances by the talented musicians from the North-East truly moved me.     Pre-Christmas jubilation & rejoicing with the children took me back to my childhood. I thank the hosts for this lovely evening.

users.name: IIT Roorkee
users.description: Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee https://www.iitr.ac.in/

posts.title: @iitroorkee wishes you all a very happy and Prosperous New Year ahead. #IITRoorkee #HappyNewYear2023
@iitroorkee initiates Project to develop Advanced Packaging Research Laboratory, Skill Development Programme

Professor Kirtiraj Gaikwad along with his research scholar Mr Lokman Hakim, Department of Paper Technology, @iitroorkee have developed ink which is a synthetic ink substitute that is completely environmentally friendly, non-toxic, and suitable for a variety of packaging and printing applications.  The edible ink is made entirely of plant-based materials and does not contain any chemicals.

Professor KK Pant, Director @iitroorkee, said: ‚Äò‚Äô#IITRDF will enable the Institute‚Äôs pursuit of excellence by serving as a liaison between the Institute and donors. Our partnership with Shah Paper Mills Limited is a second such partnership in this direction. The vision shared by Joint Managing Director shows a strong commitment of the Company towards sustainability by implementing best practices of circular economy and sensitivity towards the environment.‚Äù

Team of researchers led by Prof. Thanga Raj Chelliah, Department of WRD&M @iitroorkee are developing a battery-operated short endurance marine vessel which could replace small vessels powered by the traditional diesel engine.   The team is working towards storing sensor output data to a cloud server and preparing vessel operational data analytics. With these analytics, the vessel‚Äôs energy consumption can be optimised over a while, leading to increased operating times.
